provider.name: AirFrance
provider.description:
Obtains bonus miles from AirFrance FlyingBlue personal account (https://www.airfrance.ru)
If you don't currently have an account you can register here: https://www.airfrance.ru/cgi-bin/AF/RU/ru/local/myaccount/popin/popin_enroll_fb.jsp#/ams/account/common/registerFlyingBlueMember.htm
provider.author: Dmitry Kochin <dco@mail.ru>
